name: Lovely Cat: Dream Party
storyline: Welcome to Lovely cat dream party! Do you like lovely cats? Come and play with the Lovely cats here and create a beautiful fantasy dream party together! Collect eggs of different colors, breed different cats, take care of your cats, play with them, and create a cat dream party full of joy!
summary: All contents are free! Various patterned cats, waiting for you to explore! Different furniture and different interaction methods are waiting for you to unlock! Call your beat friends to come to Lovely cat dream party, collect kittens, and create a wonderful paradise for kittens!
